alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 3:02AM MST until March 10 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with higher amounts of 4 to 8 inches above 7000 ft on the Kaibab Plateau and Chuska Mountains. * WHERE...Areas near Jacob Lake, Fredonia, Canyon De Chelly, Chinle, Kayenta, Window Rock, Ganado, and Navajo National Monument. * WHEN...through 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Kaibab Plateau
